DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , randomise control study subject acne vulgaris . The main objective study evaluate effect supplementary patient education intervention ( addition standard-of-care patient education ) treatment adherence satisfaction among acne patient receive once-daily EpiduoTM gel treatment primary care clinic .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female subject age 12 year old , 2 . With facial acne vulgaris manage primary care 1 . Female subject pregnant , nurse plan pregnancy study , 2 . Subjects severe variant acne fulminate acne systemic symptom ( acne fulminans )
